#summary Description of p1File for lab 2
#sidebar navBar
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />
=Format=
The [p1File] is implemented by making an object of type [TextFile].
=Usage=

=Origin=
[p1File] is the object returned from [Pass1] as a [TextFile]. 
=Destination=
[p1File] is passed into [Pass2] as a parameter. It is also used as part of a dump between [Pass1] and [Pass2] to verify that [Pass1] is working correctly.
